title: Can we please trade these pajama skins for 5 more coven skins?
body:
The coven skins are abosulely awesome but the pajama skins are a waste of money and hard work from riot employees its a shame they got green lit. Id much rather have them replaced with coven skins
Id like to see coven vladimere
Coven syndra
Coven zed
Coven karma
Coven katarina
